heading: HB08492
0: AN ACT MANDATING LICENSED QUARRYING CONTRACTORS TO PRACTICE SAFETY MEASURES IN QUARRYING SITES BY REQUIRING FOR THE RESTORATION OR REMAKING OF BANKS OF WATER TO THE SAME CONDITION AS THEY WERE BEFORE QUARRYING, PRESCRIBING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS THEREOF, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
